properties.title: Pumptrack Wyssloch
properties.abstract: A pump track for bicycles, consisting of rollers, depressions and berms – this is what the neighbourhood wanted to see in the Wyssloch recreational facility near Egelsee lake. The 700 m2 area also includes a lawn for rest and relaxation when you need a time-out from “pumping”.
properties.description:
The loamy soil of the Wyssloch recreational facility is ideal for the bumpy natural pump track. On an area of 700 m2 the riders can combine berms and rollers in various different ways, and there are jump trails for advanced riders to get airborne and practice jumping.

The pump track is only one of the attractions of the Wyssloch facility during its temporary use. In addition to the lawn with benches and fruit trees where you can work on your tan, a community garden has also been planted, which is maintained by the local residents. 


Surface area: 700 m2
Surface: natural ground
properties.name: Bern Welcome
